summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein, Jes Staley, and Peter Staley discussing a communication related to Boris and the Tides Foundation. The email highlights the confidential nature of the communication and includes disclaimers regarding legal privilege and confidentiality.

keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated February 26, 2011.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the owner of the communication.
The email discusses forwarding a message to Boris regarding Peter Staley.
The communication is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
There are disclaimers regarding the unauthorized use of the email.
